div.head: NP-hard problems
div.p: main idea of the proof: reduction from the planar 3-connected 3-SAT [J. Kratochvíl, 1991] which is an NP-complete problem [J. Kratochvíl, 1994]

div.head: Simple realizability of complete AT-graphs
div.p: (1) A complete AT-graph determines the extended rotation system of its simple realization (up to inversion).

(2) For every edge e of a simple complete topological graph T and for each pair of edges f, f ∈ E(G) that have a common end-point and cross e, the AT-graph of T uniquely determines the order of crossings of e with the edges f and f .

div.head: star-cut representation:
